channel.title: Need 24/7 hoster - I PAY FOR YAH
channel.description:
I just need a 24/7 hoster, over 50 ppls waiting for godzfwars back up.
Some info: [size=24pt]I PAY:[/size] 40 dollars if you host my server 1 or 2 months!!
Msn: Jarnodag@hotmail.com Site of my source to see more screens:http://godzfwars.smfforfree4.com/index.php/topic,81.msg279.html#msg279 Screen: [img]http://img149.imageshack.us/img149/4697/godzfwarsserv12qm9.png[/img]
-Shadow aka Jarnohhh aka Legendary

item.title: Need 24/7 hoster - I PAY FOR YAH
item.dc:creator: @Master_Programmer Master Programmer.
item.description:
@Master_Programmer wrote:

=Hosters Situation=
Waiting 2 months for money… Realising you just got scammed?
=Owners Situation=
Waiting for the hoster to run the server? He took the server?
He takes all the Credits?

Mmmhmm?
For all you Owners who want a hoster and are paying, Think about it.
For all you hosters who want money?? Well, Think of a way to work that out so you won’t get scammed.
For all you Owners who are scamming, Get a Life.

Jarnohhh, This isn’t a good idea.
Hosters can steal your source, Take credits, And you will just be wasting your time.
Hosters, This isn’t a good idea.
Jarnohh can scam you by making you host the server for 2 months and when your payday comes he’ll delete you from MSN, Ignore Forum PM’s from you, So really. This isn’t a Good Idea.

Read full topic
item.source: Need 24/7 hoster - I PAY FOR YAH
